message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this sale. I can do $125, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $125 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $120, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're really interested in the product, I'm willing to make a deal at this price.
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think the product would be a great fit for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
I'm willing to make one last concession, Bob. I can meet you at $118, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your willingness to make one last concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $115 again?
